bianca.beskrivelse: In homage to the iconic wedding suit worn by Bianca Jagger in the early 1970’s, this avant-garde look combines classic Savile Row tailoring with signature Westwood embellishments. The double-breasted wool jacket is embellished with crystal and pearl beading on the lapels, styled with a cropped corset decorated with broken pearls and finished with satin pearl-embossed trousers.

aud.beskrivelse: The golden age of the silver screen is evoked in this ivory silk satin column dress, with a draped corset top and iconic Vivienne Westwood broken pearls cascading from the neckline – creating a modern classic with an asymmetrical twist.

antoinette.beskrivelse: This traditional and regal silhouette adopts a contemporary look, exposing the corset and crinoline structure beneath, overlaid with delicate Chantilly lace and a tulle Watteau train, cascading from the back of the corset. The gown is styled with a scalloped lace edge tulle cape, fastened at the back with a pearl chain.

marieantoinette.beskrivelse: This traditional and regal silhouette adopts a contemporary look, exposing the corset and crinoline structure beneath, overlaid with delicate Chantilly lace and a tulle Watteau train, cascading from the back of the corset. The gown is styled with a scalloped lace edge tulle cape, fastened at the back with a pearl chain.

The gown is styled with a scalloped lace edge tulle cape, fastened at the back with a pearl chain.

heming.beskrivelse: Taking the modern bride from day to night, the mini Hemingway Rose Dress is a transformational two-piece bridal look. The corseted mini dress, with intricate floral hand-embroidered embellishment, translucent mesh panels and exposed corsetry, is paired with a detachable voluminous cloud like floor length tulle train.
